name: Wild Kiwi
description:
Tap to fly for as long as you can, but don't get knocked out.

In Wild Kiwi, you're a kiwi bird who really needs to get a move on. Fly as far as you can and avoid the obstacles, flying rocks and helicopters that are out to get you!

Your Wild Kiwi high score is always saved, so you can compare your scores and compete with your friends.
